data.eml:eml: New brachypterous species of Dichotomius (Selenocopris) Burmeister (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) with the definition of species groups and taxonomic notes in the subgenus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Nunes, Rafael V., Vaz-De-Mello, Fernando Z. (2016): New brachypterous species of Dichotomius (Selenocopris) Burmeister (Coleoptera: Scarabaeidae: Scarabaeinae) with the definition of species groups and taxonomic notes in the subgenus. Zootaxa 4139 (1), DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4139.1.4
